Package com.github.augusto_sant.chirp

Class AudioProcessorComposer

java.lang.Object
com.github.augusto_sant.chirp.AudioProcessorComposer
public class AudioProcessorComposer extends Object
A class for composing audio processors to create a chain of effects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AudioProcessorComposer()
    Constructs an AudioProcessorComposer with an empty list of processors.
